ocean.question: I’m big and blue and have lots of water. Boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm very, very wet!
🏖️ You can find sand near me.
🐳 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am not very fast.
🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 I like to eat seaweed.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can also squirt ink! What am I?

hints.text: 🖐️ I have more arms than you do!
🐙 My arms can grab things.
⚫ I use ink to hide from danger.

ocean.question: I am a very large mammal that lives in the ocean, and I sing songs! What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I make sounds underwater.
💦 I have a blowhole on top of my head.
🐳 I'm one of the biggest animals on Earth!

ocean.question: I have pointy teeth and swim very fast in the ocean. Some people are afraid of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 Some have very sharp teeth!
🌊 I am a type of fish.
🚨 Some are known for their fins.

ocean.question: I'm small and orange with white stripes. You might find me in a sea anemone. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I'm a type of fish.
🧡 I am brightly colored.
🏠 I live in a stinging plant.

ocean.question: I can sting you and I float in the ocean. I don't have a brain or bones! What am I?

hints.text: 🪞 I'm see-through, like glass.
🌊 I float in the water.
⚡ Touching me can be painful.

ocean.question: I'm a very old reptile who swims in the ocean and lays eggs on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I am an animal with a shell.
🏖️ I visit the beach, but only to lay eggs.
🌊 I spend my whole life in the water, besides that!

ocean.question: I have a hard shell, two big claws, and walk sideways on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I have 10 legs.
➡️ I walk in a strange way.
💪 My claws can pinch!

ocean.question: I live in the ocean but I'm not a fish, and I look like a star! What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have many arms.
🤸 I can grow back an arm if I lose one.
⭐ I am shaped like a very famous geometric object.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and sometimes pretty colors. I need water to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 Bees love to visit me.
💧 I grow best with sunshine and rain.
🪴 You can plant me in a pot.

plant.question: I am tall and green, with many arms reaching to the sky. Birds like to build their homes in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am made of wood.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.

plant.question: I'm long and green and grow from a vine. Sometimes I'm pickled, sometimes I'm in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I can be crunchy.
🥪 I taste good in sandwiches.
☀️ I grow in the summer.

plant.question: I am a plant that grows in water, with big, round leaves that float. Frogs like to sit on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 Ribbit! Ribbit!
🏞️ You can find me in a pond.
⚪ My leaves are shaped like plates.

plant.question: I am a prickly plant that lives in the desert. I don't need much water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 Ouch! Be careful when you touch me.
🏜️ I like hot and dry places.
🐪 Camels might see me in the desert.

plant.question: I am a tall plant that gives us grain. You can make yummy bread from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I sway in the wind.
🍞 I can be ground into flour.
🐥 Birds like to eat my seeds.

plant.question: I have a very strong smell and keep vampires away. You use me in your food. What am I?

hints.text: 🧄 I am in the onion family.
🍝 I taste great in Italian food.
🧛 Don't worry, vampires don't exist.

plant.question: I am a very large flower that can smell bad, but I am very rare. What am I?

hints.text: 👃 My smell is like rotten meat!
🌺 I am found in rainforests.
🔍 I am the largest individual flower on Earth.

plant.question: I am a seed that makes a yummy treat when popped. You eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I go 'pop' in the microwave.
🌽 I come from a corn plant.
🧈 You can add butter and salt to me.

plant.question: I am a very old and tall tree. My needles are used to make tea rich in Vitamin C. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I am a type of conifer.
🇨🇦 Indigenous people in Canada traditionally used me for medicine
🍵 My needles have a citrus-like flavor
